metadata.synopsis: Default Dialog for Baldur's Mouth Guard 01
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the guards in the Writing Room

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Since you already convinced the guard to let you in, better leave her alone lest she changes her mind.*

1.speaker: Guard Unilda Tiro
1.text: Hang on, you're not allowed down in the basement. Only Master Needle is permitted access to the printworks.

2.speaker: Guard Unilda Tiro
2.text: I told you already, no access to the printer room. If you keep forgetting, I'll print it out and nail it to yer head. Sod off.
